org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.types

Class FXGMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.types.FXGMatrix

  • public class FXGMatrix
extends Object
    Utility class to help with matrix transformation for coordinate transformation.
